name: Enroo
description:
This is the game created during the Global Game Jam 2022, where the challenge was to make a videogame with less than 48 hours, in which the theme was "Roots".

Description: Enroo is an endless runner where you play as Enroo, a fictional character, who is running away from roots.

Team:

Alice Coanhas 

Hugo Ferreira 

Luís Valentim 

Mário Bandeira
